genresAdvancedInfo.name: bandolim
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Bandolim is a Brazilian music genre that features the mandolin as the main instrument. The music has its roots in choro, a popular genre in Brazil in the late 19th century. Bandolim is characterized by its fast tempo, intricate melodies, and improvisation. The genre has influences from European music such as waltz and polka, as
